text: Need Brooklyn Edwards for Hungry Jack's campaign. Budget around $4,085, looking for 1 x Instagram post, 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x YouTube video, 2 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x 90-second product demo. 12 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
